response.overview: A 17th-century nun becomes entangled in a forbidden lesbian affair with a novice. But it is Benedetta's shocking religious visions that threaten to shake the Church to its core.
response.tagline: I don't know God's ways, but he works his will through me.
response.title: Benedetta

titles.title: เบเนเดตต้า ใครอยากให้เธอบาป

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival
